text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews @CNN @OANN @newsmax #DonaldTrump 
Truth: U.S. COVID-19 Deaths Near 130,000. Skyrocketing. Highest daily increases ever. Dead Americans, not "too much testing." Your lies killing us. Deliberately. For political gain. Pure Evil. Puro pinche evil.
